name: Testifypodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Testify podcast”
”Alexa, start Testify podcast”
”Alexa, ask Testify podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: testify podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Testify is hosted by Andra Litton and Charlie Moreno. This show is an radio docu-series on criminal cases in El Paso, TX. We do a deep dive into some of the most interesting, powerful, and emotional criminal cases by researching open records of official police reports, court records, and we interview those who were involved to bring you the stories where the news left off. We are produced in El Paso, Texas and distributed in partnership with the El Paso Herald-Post.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Testify podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Testify podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
